title: Collision Detection & Physics
overview: Make games feel physical using AABB collision detection.

sections.title: AABB Collision
sections.content:
AABB checks if two non-rotated rectangles overlap. It is fast and simple.

Logic:
```js
return (a.x < b.x + b.w && a.x + a.w > b.x && ...)
```

questions.question: What is the limitation of AABB?
options: It cannot handle rotated shapes accurately
questions.correctAnswer: It cannot handle rotated shapes accurately
questions.explanation: Because the box is always aligned to X/Y axes, rotating the object does not rotate the box.
